mapper.update: update admininfo set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_psw = #{adminPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_state = #{adminState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_psw, admin_state, start_time, end_time from admininfo
